mind.name: Keen Instincts
mind.effect: +1 die to detect lies, traps, or ambushes.

mind.name: Cold Reader
mind.effect: After one minute of conversation, learn a detail about someone's motives or fears.

mind.name: Silver Tongue
mind.effect: Reroll one failed persuasion attempt per session.

mind.name: Calculated Risk
mind.effect: Once per scene, gain advantage when planning before acting.

mind.name: Rapid Recall
mind.effect: Once per session, declare that you 'read about this before' and instantly recall obscure facts.

mind.name: Tactician’s Eye
mind.effect: Allies gain +1 die on their first action in combat if you take the lead.

mind.name: Inventive
mind.effect: Jury-rig simple tools or weapons; once per session roll Mind instead of Body for a physical task.

body.name: Iron Constitution
body.effect: Once per scene, ignore a Light Wound result.

body.name: Pugilist
body.effect: +1 die in unarmed combat; Light Wounds from punches escalate to Medium.

body.name: Deadeye
body.effect: Once per scene, reroll a failed firearm attack.

body.name: Steely Nerves
body.effect: Resistance to fear, intimidation, or supernatural dread.

body.name: Fleet of Foot
body.effect: +1 die when chasing or escaping on foot.

body.name: Second Wind
body.effect: Once per day, clear one Light Wound with a short rest.

body.name: Street Brawler
body.effect: Improvised weapons deal one step higher on the wound scale.

soul.name: Aura of Conviction
soul.effect: Allies gain +1 die when acting under your leadership.

soul.name: Faithful
soul.effect: Resist one supernatural effect per session through sheer will.

soul.name: Empathic Sense
soul.effect: Roll Soul to detect emotions or stress in others.

soul.name: Blessed Words
soul.effect: Once per session, speak a phrase/prayer that cancels a minor supernatural effect.

soul.name: Iron Will
soul.effect: +1 die to resist corruption, domination, or possession.

soul.name: Inspiring Presence
soul.effect: After a stirring speech, restore 1 Light Wound to an ally.

soul.name: Spiritual Anchor
soul.effect: Nearby allies use your Soul instead of their own to resist fear or possession.

supernatural.name: Pact Brand
supernatural.effect: +2 dice on a roll by calling demonic power; risk gaining Corruption.

supernatural.name: Guardian’s Grace
supernatural.effect: Once per day, reroll a failed Soul save.

supernatural.name: Occult Scholar
supernatural.effect: You may safely handle, read, or translate arcane texts.

supernatural.name: Exorcist’s Rite
supernatural.effect: With preparation, expel minor spirits or demons.

supernatural.name: Hexbreaker
supernatural.effect: +1 die to resist curses; nearby allies gain the same bonus.

supernatural.name: Shadowstep
supernatural.effect: Once per scene, move unseen between two nearby shadows.

supernatural.name: Blood Oath
supernatural.effect: Spill your own blood to gain advantage on a single action (cost: 1 Light Wound).

supernatural.name: Angel’s Whisper
supernatural.effect: Once per day, receive a cryptic divine clue or warning.

supernatural.name: Monster Slayer
supernatural.effect: Against supernatural creatures, your damage escalates one step higher on the wound track.
